method: Wash your hands and put on an apron. Weigh and measure all the ingredients. Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 5.  Roll out the pastry onto a lightly floured surface and cut out four circles using a 8cm/3¼ in cutter. Line four holes in a muffin tin with the pastry circles. Spoon the lemon curd into the pastry cases.  Melt the butter in a small saucepan and leave it to cool a little. Next add the oats, sugar and flour to the butter and mix with a fork, breaking it up into crumbs.  Sprinkle the crumbs onto the top of the tarts. Place the muffin tin onto a baking tray and bake for 15-20 minutes. Serve with fresh raspberries or strawberries.
ingredients: 125g/4½oz shortcrust pastry ,  4 rounded tsp lemon curd ,  30g/1oz butter ,  2 tbsp rolled oats ,  2 dessertspoons caster sugar,  2 tbsp self-raising flour, plus extra for dusting
